content_descriptors.notes:
Lustful Victor contains the following content:
- Erotic outfits, explicit language, sexual comments and adult situations
- Sex scenes (consensual sex, non consensual, fellatio, masturbation, erotic massage)
-Scene with fantasy and cybernetic beasts (beastiality)
- All characters in Lustful Victor are 18+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64Bit). or Linux (Steam OS)
  • Processor: Dual Core Pentium or equivalent Processor
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 2000 or equivalent Graphics
  • Storage: 76.5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
